Assignment No. 2

CS502

 

Question No 01:

You are required to determine (write down the name) the algorithm being used while sorting the above given array.

Answer:

Selection sort is the algorithm used in the scenario because if sorts an array by repeatedly finding the minimum element from unsorted part and putting it at the beginning.

 

Question No 02:

You are required to design (write) the algorithm (Only Pseudo code) determined in Question 1.

Answer:

SelectionSort(array , n)

{

for j ← 1 to n-1

smallest ← j A

for i ← j + 1 to n

if array[i] < array[smallest]

smallest ← I B

temp = array[i]

array[i] = array[min] C

array[min] = temp

}

Question No 03:

You are required to calculate (Step by Step) the worst case time complexity T(n) of the algorithm designed in Question No. 02.

 

Answer:

A = (n-1)

B = (n-1) +(n-2) +…+ 1

= <Object: word/embeddings/oleObject1.bin>

C = (n-1)

T(n) = (n-1) A + <Object: word/embeddings/oleObject2.bin> B + (n-1) C

T(n) = an2 + bn + c

Here a, b and c are constants in term of A, B and C

T(n) = O(n2)
